    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ciklotronsko gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">Cyclotronic motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cyclotronic Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de Cyclotronic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento de Cyclotronic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento di Cyclotronic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλοτρονική κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de Cyclotronic</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Principi delovanja pospeševalnikov delcev oz. ciklotronov ter vpliv mase in naboja na krožno gibanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Basic principle of cyclotron - trajectory of charged particle with mass through electric and magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ciklotron</string>
            <string language="en">cyclotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krožno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundprinzip von Cyclotron - Flugbahn des 
belasteten Partikels mit Masse durch elektrisches und magnetisches 
fangen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Principe de base de cyclotron - trajectoire de 
particule chargée avec la masse par le champ électrique et 
magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Princípio básico do cyclotron - trajectory da 
partícula carregada com massa através do campo elétrico e 
magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principio di base del ciclotrone - traiettoria 
della particella caricata con massa attraverso il campo elettrico e 
magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασική αρχή του κυκλοτρονίου - τροχιά του χρεωμένου 
μορίου με τη μάζα μέσω του ηλεκτρικού και μαγνητικού πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Principio de base del ciclotrón - trayectoria de
la partícula cargada con la masa a través del campo eléctrico y 
magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cyclotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cyclotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement circulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
